name: California Aviation Services, Inc.
about: California Aviation Services, Inc., owned and operated by Leo and Raquel Bell for over 20 years, boasts a rich history in aviation training. Founded by Leo, who began his flight training in 1979 and later became a certified flight instructor (CFI) and chief pilot, the school has evolved from its humble beginnings to a renowned institution. With a staff of professional pilots from diverse backgrounds, including military, police, airlines, and news media, the school offers comprehensive training programs for Private Pilot, Commercial Pilot, and Flight Instructor certifications. Located at the Riverside Municipal Airport, California Aviation Services provides top-notch instruction in both airplanes and helicopters, ensuring students gain valuable experience in real-world aviation scenarios. The school's commitment to excellence and safety has made it a trusted name in aviation education.
